title: Riot wheres the new champion select? :(

replies.body: It's already up for ranked, it won't be up for normals queue for quite some time, because they need to configure a lot of things to make it compatible for normals, eg. ban system. Just be patient, Riot's doing their best :)
I get that they may not be sure but there is no info anywhere! plz don't forget us.

To be honest, Riot NA are still yet to post anything about the new champion select, they still seem to be testing it for the bugs, currently there are 20-50 minute queue timers for people without queue bans. 

Riot need to fix this major issue before releasing the new champion select.

> [{quoted}](name=DV Silent Resent,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=YBpvu1AY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-19T09:22:57.095+0000)
>
> To be honest, Riot NA are still yet to post anything about the new champion select, they still seem to be testing it for the bugs, currently there are 20-50 minute queue timers for people without queue bans. 
> 
> Riot need to fix this major issue before releasing the new champion select.

Pretty sure most of the timer issues is because everyone wants mid and its hard to find less enjoyable roles like support

> Pretty sure most of the timer issues is because everyone wants mid and its hard to find less enjoyable roles like support

Could be, but generally, the larger queue timers are for people in Diamond 1 to Challenger... People in Challenger have their main roles, and can easily fill any other role. How is it that they are getting 40 min queue timers?
I don't think even they know.

The new ranked season starts in 7.5 hours and riot is yet to communicate ANY information besides 72 hours past NA launch.

Just say it won't be ready for ranked launch or something.

If I recall correctly, NA would have to verify that the new champ select doesn't have any bugs/glitches before sending it to Oce and other regions. Be thankful we don't have to be the one to find out all the bugs and glitches :). We'll probably get it in a week or so but it's best if a rioter commented regarding this.
That's what I want to know too. Isn't the new season tomorrow? They're leaving it a bit late, aren't they?
why did you feel the need to add cringe to this simple post?
